top.title: Released Israeli hostage says he was sexually assaulted in Gaza captivity
top.summary: In an interview with Israeli TV, Rom Braslavski described how he was stripped naked and tied up by members of Palestinian Islamic Jihad.

top.title: Belgium rushes to secure drone defences after airport disruption
top.summary: After drone sightings cause Zaventem airport near Brussels to close temporarily, Belgium turns to its European allies for help.

top.title: Why human-shaped robots loom large in Musk's Tesla plans
top.summary: The tech billionaire believes Optimus could play a big role in the lives of people around the world.

top.title: What does Elon Musk do with all his money?
top.summary: While he has a penchant for cars and jets, the world's richest person reportedly lives a relatively modest life.
